compulsions.name: Hunger
compulsions.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** Until the vampire slakes one hunger, they will do *anything* to satisfy their craving.

compulsions.name: Dominance
compulsions.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** Without help or teamwork the vampire has a need to *win*, to *gloat* about it, and lasts until they do so; they'll do anything to achieve this.

compulsions.name: Harm
compulsions.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** A strong desire to harm someone or something of value, simply because they can, and lasts until they do so. This can be physical, emotional, or social harm.

compulsions.name: Paranoia
compulsions.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** Paranoid of anyone or anything, they have a need to retreat at all costs and this ends when they spend an hour in a 'safe spot'.

clan.name: Brujah
clan.description: **[-2 to All Rolls]** This Compulsion ends once they've changed someone's mind or rebelled against their orders.

clan.name: Gangrel
clan.description: **[-3 to Manipulation/Intelligence]** For one scene they resort to an animalistic state and can only speak in one-word sentences.

clan.name: Malkavian
clan.description: **[-2 to Dexterity/Manipulation/Composure/Wits]** For one scene the vampire's mind and perceptions are skewed.

clan.name: Nosferatu
clan.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** This Compulsion ends when the Nosferatu learns a useful secret.

clan.name: Toreador
clan.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** Obsessed with a single gorgeous thing for one scene or until they can no longer perceive the thing.

clan.name: Tremere
clan.description: **[-2 to All Rolls]** Until a critical or end of scene, the Tremere seeks obessive perfectionism. Reduce the penalty for repeated actions.

clan.name: Ventrue
clan.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Leadership]** The Ventrue has a need to assume command until an order is naturally obeyed.

clan.name: Lasombra
clan.description: **[-2 to All Rolls]** Focused on achieving their goals at any cost, they receive a dice penalty until the redeem a failure.

clan.name: Banu
clan.description: **[-3 to All Rolls]** With a compulsion to punish transgression, they suffer a 3 dice penalty until they slake hunger from anyone that acts against a conviction.

clan.name: Ministry
clan.description: **[-2 to rolls not for Compulsion]** Suffering a need to entice someone to break a Tenet or Conviction, and causing a Stain before ending the Compulsion.
